name: Verify validation works as expected on name page
scenarioId: NamePage:Verify validation works as expected on name page
methodName: Verify validation works as expected on name page

testSteps.description: 1: Verify validation works as expected on name page ({testno=TC1, age=31, firstname=AutoTestFName, lastname=AutoTestLName, output=Postcode Page})

children.description: Given I am checking to see if I am exempt from paying for prescriptions
When I declare my age as "31"
And my firstname is "AutoTestFName" and my lastname is "AutoTestLName"
Then I will see this "Postcode Page"

testSteps.description: 2: Verify validation works as expected on name page ({testno=TC2, age=26, firstname=NoFirstName, lastname=NoLastName, output=Name Error})

children.description: Given I am checking to see if I am exempt from paying for prescriptions
When I declare my age as "26"
And my firstname is "NoFirstName" and my lastname is "NoLastName"
Then I will see this "Name Error"

children.description: Given I am checking to see if I am exempt from paying for prescriptions

testSteps.description: 4: Verify validation works as expected on name page ({testno=TC4, age=31, firstname=12345, lastname=56789, output=Name Invalid})

children.description: Given I am checking to see if I am exempt from paying for prescriptions

testSteps.description: 5: Verify validation works as expected on name page ({testno=TC5, age=26, firstname=£$%^&, lastname=)(*&^), output=Name Invalid})

children.description: Given I am checking to see if I am exempt from paying for prescriptions

children.description: Given I am checking to see if I am exempt from paying for prescriptions

testSteps.description: 7: Verify validation works as expected on name page ({testno=TC8, age=26, firstname=André, lastname=ampère, output=Name Invalid})

children.description: Given I am checking to see if I am exempt from paying for prescriptions
